description.isOutlined: Removes any background set on the button and sets text, border and background on hover to be the same color.
description.label: The label of the button.
description.href: Where should the button link to?
description.target: Open a new tab or not?
description.componentElement: The tag to use for this component.
description.color: The color of an outlined button.
description.size: The size of the button; sm, md, lg. Only works on buttons that are not icon buttons
description.reverseIcon: Reverse the order of text and icon (default is to the left)
description.floating: An array with two booleans, animate and hover, if both are set to false then the button will be floating by it's own
description.isIconButton: No text, only an icon, full border radius
description.background: The background color of the button; primary and secondary
description.container: if toggle is set to true the js-toggle-container attribute will be applied, otherwise it's just a div
